text: The Citroën Basalt is a Subcompact Crossover SUV made by the French car manufacturer Citroën. It was designed for markets in developing regions like India and South America. == History == The Basalt was introduced as a new model in 2024. It was first shown to the public as a concept car called the "Basalt Vision" in March 2024. The production version of the car was revealed on 2 August 2024, with teaser images being shared in July. == Markets == The Citroën Basalt is sold mainly in emerging markets, like India and Brazil. ===India=== The Citroën Basalt was launched in India on 30 August 2024. It is available in three trim levels: You, Plus, and Max. The car comes with two engine options: a 1.2-litre petrol engine and a 1.2-litre turbocharged petrol engine. ===Brazil=== The Basalt was launched in Brazil on 2 October 2024. It is offered in three trim levels: Feel, Shine, and First Edition. In Brazil, it comes with a choice of two engines: a 1.0-litre petrol engine and a 1.0-litre turbocharged petrol engine. == References == Category:2020s automobiles Category:Citroën automobiles Category:Sport Utility Vehicles
